description: The sale of the firm to Brittany Ferries and an investment fund has been completed.
title: Condor Ferries sale to investment fund and Brittany Ferries completed
title_page: Condor Ferries sale to investment fund and Brittany Ferries completed - BBC News
maintext: Christophe Mathieu, CEO of Brittany Ferries which is the minority shareholder of Condor, said: "We are committed to working closely in the months and years to come to ensure the best level of service to customers and support to our friends and colleagues in the Channel Islands.
